Written and published from home in Chandler, Arizona.
The global coronavirus outbreak has created an increasing number of challenges to individuals, families, communities and companies. It’s a unique situation we find ourselves in, as most of us have never experienced a health crisis of this scale.
For information on how we are responding to COVID-19, please visit the Aerospace FAQ page <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/aero-covid-19]]>.
We are currently offering a six (6) month free trial on GoDirectTrade.com <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/]]> and I wanted to share site features that will help you succeed in this new digital sales era. These features are illustrated in very short videos:
How to Launch Your Storefront in 3 Easy Steps (34 seconds) <[[https://youtu.be/qtDwqcJeQVY]]> How to Control Pricing Displayed to Each Company (44 seconds) <[[https://screencast-o-matic.com/watch/cqjUYCt0o6]]> How to Control Who Sees Your Listing (35 seconds) <[[https://screencast-o-matic.com/watch/cq6FYzuBN3]]> How to Export Customer Search Data - Real Time (31 seconds) <[[https://screencast-o-matic.com/watch/cqju3jtrzt]]> How to Quote a Customer from a Conversation they Initiated (37 seconds) <[[https://screencast-o-matic.com/watch/cqju33trAO]]> LAUNCH MY STOREFRONT NOW <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/customer/oauth/login/user_type/customer/deeplink/bWFya2V0cGxhY2UvYWNjb3VudC9lZGl0UHJvZmlsZS8=]]> I’m here to help show you how to efficiently load a few listings, all the way up to thousands of listings. Simply reply to this email and we can get started.
Stay safe,
Keith Doty Director of Operations GoDirect Trade, Powered by Honeywell Keith.Doty@Honeywell.com <[[mailto:keith.doty@honeywell.com]]> Cell: 480.235.1852
